comment: Whenever you try to edit a photo, the image disappears. The screen goes completely black. How do you go about editing an image that is invisible? I have been very keen to update the app whenever a new version is released hoping that the bug would be resolved but to no avail. To make it worse my phone didn't come with the stock android photo viewer/editor. So this is the only editor available for me. Can you fix this bug please! How about image autorotation by device orientation?
scenarios: Try to edit a photo, the image disappears, and the screen goes completely black.
(Indirectly referenced) Image autorotation by device orientation.
key sentence: Try to edit a photo, the image disappears, and the screen goes completely black.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, view archive/locked floder, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various deleting and sharing options.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Navigate up', 'description': 'Move to the parent screen'}, {'name': 'Favorite', 'description': 'Mark the item as a favorite'}, {'name': 'More options', 'description': 'Access additional options'}, {'name': 'Cast', 'description': 'Cast the photo.'}, {'name': 'Share', 'description': 'Share the item with others'}, {'name': 'Edit', 'description': 'Edit the item'}, {'name': 'Lens', 'description': 'Open the lens feature'}, {'name': 'Delete', 'description': 'Delete the item'}]

comment: Whenever you try to edit a photo, the image disappears. The screen goes completely black. How do you go about editing an image that is invisible? I have been very keen to update the app whenever a new version is released hoping that the bug would be resolved but to no avail. To make it worse my phone didn't come with the stock android photo viewer/editor. So this is the only editor available for me. Can you fix this bug please!
